title: IHC and Lunate Sign MoU to Explore Ghaf Benefits Enrollment
description: Lunate, an Abu Dhabi-based global investment manager, announced the signing of a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with International Holding Company (IHC) to explore enrolling IHC and its portfolio companies in the Ghaf Benefits plan, an Alternative End-of-Service Benefits fund platform launched by Lunate under the UAEâ€™s voluntary scheme. Ghaf Benefits offers investment-backed end-of-service gratuity options to employees, aiming to enhance financial security and workplace benefits in the UAE.
source_name: International Holding Company (IHC) signs MoU with Lunate to join Ghaf Benefits

opportunities.title: Payroll Integration for Ghaf Benefits
opportunities.description: Payroll software providers can integrate their platforms with Ghaf Benefits to streamline employee enrollment, contributions tracking, and reporting, making it easier for companies to adopt the new end-of-service scheme and comply with UAE regulations.
roadmap_steps: Research Ghaf Benefits platform technical requirements
Develop APIs or plug-ins for payroll software to interface with Ghaf Benefits
Market the integrated solution to UAE-based companies

opportunities.title: HR Consultancy Services for Ghaf Benefits Adoption
opportunities.description: Human resources consultancies can offer advisory and implementation services to companies considering the transition to the Ghaf Benefits end-of-service fund, helping them with policy adjustment, employee communications, and compliance.
roadmap_steps: Study Ghaf Benefits plan features and regulatory framework
Develop an advisory package for Ghaf Benefits transition
Promote services to UAE-based enterprises and HR networks
Assist clients in plan rollout and transition management

opportunities.title: Wellness Platform Partnership for Enhanced Employee Offering
opportunities.description: Employee wellness platforms can partner with Ghaf Benefits to offer bundled financial wellness tools and workshops, helping enrolled companies differentiate themselves in attracting and retaining talent.
roadmap_steps: Propose value-add wellness services linked to Ghaf Benefits
Integrate digital tools and educational materials with Ghaf Benefits

opportunities.title: Real Estate Savings Schemes for Employees
opportunities.description: Real estate developers can collaborate with Ghaf Benefits to offer exclusive property investment or home purchase schemes to employees using their end-of-service benefits, incentivizing enrollment in both the benefits program and real estate projects.
roadmap_steps: Design property investment packages tailored for Ghaf Benefits users
Reach out to Lunate for co-marketing opportunities
Develop communication materials for HR departments and employees

opportunities.title: FinTech Investment Product Integration
opportunities.description: FinTech firms specializing in employee investment or retirement products can integrate with the Ghaf Benefits platform, offering employees additional customized savings and investment options.
roadmap_steps: Develop investment products compliant with the platform
Collaborate with Lunate to enable product listing on Ghaf Benefits
Support onboarding and financial education campaigns
